title: Before I Breathe
description: Thought she met the right boy. Left home. Now her life's turned upside down.  Kalena Moore is a Montgomery High student who isn't into school. Her friends think her classmate, Isaiah Wilkins, is trouble. Life becomes more interesting when Kalena starts dating Isaiah, but soon things spin quickly out of control and she gets pregnant. Then Kalena sees another side to her boyfriend. Determined to put her life back together, Kalena takes a new path, navigating the pitfalls along the way.
author: Jenelle Jack Pierre
